content.raw:
For some teams it was more than a weekend's worth of work and planing.

My only objection is that it makes the challenge a lot less interesting. It eliminates having to figure out and optimize the door all together. But I also wonder about that change at this stage. It is all your call as the organizers but I was not expecting that dramatic of a change.
content.html:
For some teams it was more than a weekend's worth of work and planing.

My only objection is that it makes the challenge a lot less interesting. It eliminates having to figure out and optimize the door all together. But I also wonder about that change at this stage. It is all your call as the organizers but I was not expecting that dramatic of a change.
